attributes.additional_details: There should be a Greggs inside Westminster because MPS do a hard job and deserve a Steak bake or a sausage roll
attributes.background: There should be a Greggs opened up inside Westminster

rejection.details: The Government or UK Parliament are not responsible for deciding where Greggs chooses to open its outlets. You will be pleased to know that MPs have the Greggs at Westminster tube station which sells a full range of sausage rolls and steak bakes.
